lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Pete Wentz/Patrick Stump/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Raja Kumari/Suzanne Vega/Jonathan Rotem/Michael J. Fonesca/Justin Tranter
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Pete Wentz/Patrick Stump/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley/Raja Kumari/Suzanne Vega/Jonathan Rotem/Michael J. Fonesca/Justin Tranter
[00:00.000]Do-do-do-do do-do-do-do
[00:02.960]Do-do-do-do do-do-do-do
[00:06.360]Some legends are told
[00:08.040]Some turn to dust or to gold
[00:10.350]But you will remember me
[00:14.460]Remember me for centuries
[00:17.160]And just one mistake
[00:19.600]Is all it will take
[00:21.460]We'll go down in history
[00:24.970]Remember me for centuries
[00:27.920]Hey-ya, hey, hey-ya
[00:35.690]Remember me for centuries
[00:39.290]Mummified my teenage dreams
[00:41.840]No, it's nothing wrong with me
[00:44.360]The kids are all wrong The story's all off
[00:47.070]Heavy metal broke my heart
[00:49.730]Come on, come on and let me in
[00:52.490]Bruises on your thighs like my fingerprints
[00:55.190]And this is supposed to match
[00:56.450]The darkness that you felt
[00:57.910]I never meant for you to fix yourself
[01:00.460]Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do
[01:06.280]Some legends are told
[01:08.030]Some turn to dust or to gold
[01:10.610]But you will remember me
[01:14.130]Remember me for centuries
[01:17.070]And just one mistake
[01:19.530]Is all it will take
[01:21.550]We'll go down in history
[01:24.950]Remember me for centuries
[01:27.960]Hey-ya, hey, hey-ya
[01:35.730]Remember me for centuries
[01:38.730]And I can't stop 'til the whole world knows my name
[01:41.480]Cause I was only born inside my dreams
[01:44.230]Until you die for me
[01:45.530]As long as there's a light
[01:47.040]My shadow's over you
[01:48.400]Cause I-I am the opposite of amnesia
[01:55.160]And you're a cherry blossom
[01:56.510]You're about to bloom
[01:57.860]You look so pretty
[01:59.010]But you're gone so soon
[02:04.140]Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do
[02:05.790]Some legends are told
[02:07.840]Some turn to dust or to gold
[02:10.440]But you will remember me
[02:13.920]Remember me for centuries
[02:16.930]And just one mistake
[02:19.340]Is all it will take
[02:21.280]We'll go down in history
[02:24.750]Remember me for centuries
[02:27.910]Hey-ya, hey, hey-ya
[02:35.510]Remember me for centuries
[02:39.010]We've been here forever
[02:44.170]And here's the frozen proof
[02:49.580]I could scream forever
[02:54.880]We are the poisoned youth
[02:59.980]Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do
[03:10.960]Some legends are told
[03:12.910]Some turn to dust or to gold
[03:15.770]But you will remember me
[03:18.970]Remember me for centuries
[03:22.030]And just one mistake
[03:24.420]Is all it will take
[03:26.780]We'll go down in history
[03:29.880]Remember me for centuries
[03:33.060]Hey-ya, hey
[03:38.060]We'll go down in history hey-ya
[03:41.540]Remember me for centuries
tlyric:
[by:若思林如溪]
[00:00.000]Do-do-do-do do-do-do-do
[00:02.960]Do-do-do-do do-do-do-do
[00:06.360]一些传说被口口相传
[00:08.040]一些化为灰烬或成为永恒
[00:10.350]但你会将我永远铭记
[00:14.460]永生永世将我牢记于心
[00:17.160]只是一着不慎
[00:19.600]却落得满盘皆输
[00:21.460]我们将被载入史册
[00:24.970]永生永世将我牢记于心
[00:27.920]Hey-ya, hey, hey-ya
[00:35.690]永生永世将我牢记于心
[00:39.290]年少轻狂的梦想似木乃伊般干枯僵化
[00:41.840]不，错不在我
[00:44.360]那些天真的孩子才是大错特错  那些故事也终究将结束
[00:47.070]现实的重金属使我的心满目疮痍
[00:49.730]来吧，让我加入你们
[00:52.490]你腿上的淤伤似我的指纹
[00:55.190]而它们本就完美贴合
[00:56.450]你所经历的黑暗时光
[00:57.910]我从未打算让你独自承受
[01:00.460]Do-do-do-do-do-do-do-do

[01:27.960]Hey-ya, hey, hey-ya
[01:35.730]永生永世将我牢记于心
[01:38.730]我不能停下直至世人皆知我的名讳
[01:41.480]因为我生而逐梦
[01:44.230]直至你为我而亡
[01:45.530]只要有一线生机
[01:47.040]我的阴影便将你时刻笼罩
[01:48.400]因为我是缺失的对立面
[01:55.160]而你是一树樱花
[01:56.510]即将含苞待放
[01:57.860]你的美丽看似永恒
[01:59.010]但终究是昙花一现
